Physical Models: I could create physical models of the concepts I am studying or working on. This would allow me to visualize and understand the subject matter better.
Board Games: I could create board games related to my work or studies. This would allow me to learn and teach others in a fun and interactive way.
Pen and Paper: I could use pen and paper to plan and organize my work or studies. This would allow me to keep track of my progress and ideas.
Outdoor Activities: I could engage in outdoor activities related to my work or studies. This would allow me to gain new perspectives and ideas.
Collaboration with Others: I could collaborate with others who do not rely on computers. This would allow me to continue my work or studies through teamwork and discussion.
